messages.message: Is there a reason that for a community user with no associated commercial org we still show the workspace selector? It looks like on the homepage we use it as an opportunity to upsell but on the project nav we show the selector with no other options than just the default workspace
Feels like we should add upsell in build too
this is true in both build and converse btw. But yeah I feel like we should either add the upsell there or just not show it
